rationale: No intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifies a risk-adjective from the specified list.
The segment describes culling using neutral language ('depopulated').
The segment uses containment verbs ('depopulated') which are Neutral per rules.
The segment reports actions taken (depopulation) but contains no explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a minimiser combined with a scale contrast.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Describes planned and completed actions ('birds on the properties will be depopulated', 'depopulation is complete') as implemented/planned safeguards.
